translation: Qsm chhu timn guryn hund yimn dvr tulnh vizi phrkh khsan chhu.
Tvpth chhu qsm timn guryn hund yim knyn petth nʿl dar paddr travnh sintụ̄ rhh travan chhi.
Tvpth chhu qsm timn guryn hund yim ṣubḥạe pghạe chhi dshmnn petth vạtith pyvan, tvpth chhi timn lvutt th ghart kran.
Byyhi yim gurụ̄ tamhi saʿth grd v ghbar chhi tulan.
Tvpth chhi tmy vqth dshmnn hndis jmaʿts th lshkrih mnz aaczan. (yimn qasmn hund jvab chhu yʿny yim qasm āe havnh yath kthhi petth kh)
Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ yhi kạfr ansan chhu pnnis khdae snz nashkry kran.
Byyhi chhu be shk yhi ansan panh tath petth muṭlʿ th gvah.
Byyhi chhu be shk yhi ansan mal kis mḥbts andr setthah mẓbvṭ (tamy chhus nh kynhh thi dryntth yivan) mal kis mḥbts andr chhu tiyvth bvddmut ghrq gvmut kh mnʿm ḥqyqy snz nʿmczh chhas nh bvzne yivan.
Kyah sana amis ansans chhuna suh vqt czyth se yymhi vqth qbrv mnz prạttith kddnh yiyhi thi svrue yhi tath mnz āshi mordh vghyrh.
Byyhi yiyhi nnhi ravnh thi svrue yhi synn th diln mnz āshi.
Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ tuhund prvrdigar āshi tamhi doh tuhndyn sarine ḥalatn petth bakhbr th pvur vạqf. (suh diyhi timn suh bdlh yus timn shvubhi)
